# pesa

<!-- badges: start -->
[![Lifecycle: experimental](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-experimental-orange.svg)](https://lifecycle.r-lib.org/articles/stages.html#experimental)
[![CRAN status](https://www.r-pkg.org/badges/version/pesa)](https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=pesa)

This is my personal R package where I gather the various R functions I have found useful in one place.

## Installation

You can install the released version of `pesa` from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
remotes::install_github("PaulESantos/pesa")
```
